sources.title: Swamp Water (1941)
sources.description: A hunter happens upon a fugitive and his daughter living in a Georgia swamp. He falls in love with the girl and persuades the fugitive to return to town. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/swamp-water-1941/

metadata.Plot: A hunter happens upon a fugitive and his daughter living in a Georgia swamp. He falls in love with the girl and persuades the fugitive to return to town.
metadata.Actors: Walter Brennan, Walter Huston, Anne Baxter
